hibernate-mapping.query: FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.masters.RateMinChargeableWeightDO minChrg where minChrg.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateCustomerCategoryDO.rateCustomerCategoryCode =:rateCustomerCategoryCode AND minChrg.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryType =:rateProductCategoryType ORDER BY minChrg.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryId, minChrg.minChargeableWeight
